com.qualcomm.hardware.ams

Class AMSColorSensor.Parameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.hardware.ams.AMSColorSensor.Parameters
  • Enclosing interface:
    AMSColorSensor

    public static class AMSColorSensor.Parameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Instances of Parameters contain data indicating how the sensor is to be initialized.
    See Also:
    AMSColorSensor.initialize(Parameters)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int deviceId
      the device id expected to be reported by the color sensor chip
      AMSColorSensor.Gain gain
      the gain level to use
      I2cAddr i2cAddr
      the address at which the sensor resides on the I2C bus.
      AMSColorSensor.IntegrationTime integrationTime
      the integration time to use
      boolean loggingEnabled
      debugging aid: enable logging for this device?
      java.lang.String loggingTag
      debugging aid: the logging tag to use when logging
      I2cDeviceSynch.ReadWindow readWindow
      set of registers to read in background, if supported by underlying I2cDeviceSynch
